title: A. J. Cronin's Working-Class Heroes | The Stars Look Down (1940) | Colorized | Full Movie

sources.title: A. J. Cronin's Working-Class Heroes | The Stars Look Down (1940) | Colorized | Full Movie
sources.description:
A Gripping Tale of Injustice and Resilience
A coal miner's son named Davey Fenwick (Sir Michael Redgrave), dreams of escaping the working-class life in a mining town. However, his ambitions are challenged as he witnesses the struggles, hardships, and injustices faced by the miners and their families in the face of exploitative mining owners.

Original title: The Stars Look Down

Original Black & White version: https://youtu.be/o-3xd1pAwCw

Director: Carol Reed
Writers: A.J. Cronin, J.B. Williams, A. Coppel
Stars: Michael Redgrave, Margaret Lockwood, Edward Rigby
Genre: Colorized classics, Drama
